verbs.description: " No one [V: can] serve two masters . Either you will hate the one and love the other , or you will be devoted to the one and despise the other . " ( Matthew 6:24 ) The verse refers to money , but in light of today 's debate about the unaccountable devotion many Christian leaders have for President Trump it is not a stretch to apply it to their relationship with him .
